main event: Capt. Charles A. Hardin observed two flying saucers on two separate occasions in April 1954.
interesting points: The first sighting involved two small, brightly colored objects that moved sharply to the left and disappeared within 5 seconds., The second object was approximately 50 feet in diameter and was observed shortly before sunset., The objects were described as having rainbow hues and a bluish trail., The sighting occurred from the seacoast and from a freight train caboose., Hardin had never seen anything unusual in the previous fifty years of his life.
